name: Selloutpunk
description:
Sellout punk is game about being a bartender in a cyberpunk city. But you owe a big time money to local mobster boss Mr. BabyFace. You need to work your ass off to pay off your debt - and sell pieces of your life if you are not able to gather enough credits. But how big part of your life can you sell before you stop being a human?

Team behind this game:

  •  Jakub Eremiáš - Art and animation 
  • Jan Holan - Design and programming
  •  Mikuláš Hrdlička - Design and programming
  •  Jan Knot - Music 
  • Sterling Tuttle - Art

The game was made for Ludum Dare 44
